    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109805</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Covalent bond in a water molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kovalente Bindung in einem Wassermolekül</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obligation covalente dans une molécule d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligação covalent em uma molécula de água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legame covalente in una molecola di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιοπολικός δεσμός σε ένα μόριο ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enlace covalente en una molécula de agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the first of a series of four diagrams showing chemical bonds. The hydrogen atoms form covalent bonds with the oxygen atom.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das erste einer Reihe von vier 
Diagrammen, die chemische Bindungen zeigen. Die Wasserstoffatome
bilden kovalente Bindungen mit dem Sauerstoffatom.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le premier d'une série de quatre 
diagrammes montrant les obligations chimiques. Les atomes 
d'hydrogène forment les obligations covalentes avec l'atome 
d'oxygène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o primeiro de uma série de quatro 
diagramas que mostram ligações químicas. Os átomos do 
hidrogênio dão forma a ligações covalent com o átomo de 
oxigênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la prima di una serie di quattro schemi 
che mostrano i legami chimici. Gli atomi dell'idrogeno formano i
legami covalenti con l'atomo di ossigeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η πρώτη μιας σειράς τεσσάρων διαγραμμάτων
που εμφανίζουν χημικούς δεσμούς. Τα άτομα υδρογόνου 
διαμορφώνουν τους ομοιοπολικούς δεσμούς με το άτομο οξυγόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el primer de una serie de cuatro 
diagramas que muestran vínculos químicos. Los átomos del 
hidrógeno forman enlaces covalentes con el átomo de oxígeno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kovalente Bindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffatom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">molekulare Struktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
